title: 07/22/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 07/22/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP is joined by a handful of guests from around sports. The MMQB's Albert Breer calls in to discuss the report that Texas and Oklahoma have reached out to the SEC about joining the conference. The Bucks Pat Connaughton joins the show to discuss their Championship celebration. And Gerry Dulac of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette explains what type of shape Ben showed up to camp in.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

The Bucks Pat Connaughton joins the show to discuss their Championship celebration. And Gerry Dulac of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette explains what type of shape Ben showed up to camp in.
